snippet: Mr. Letterman, who in May stepped down as the host of CBS’s “Late Show,” made a surprise appearance on Friday night at the Majestic Theater in San Antonio, Tex., and talked about Donald Trump’s presidential campaign.
abstract: Mr. Letterman, who in May stepped down as the host of CBS’s “Late Show,” made a surprise appearance on Friday night at the Majestic Theater in San Antonio, Tex., and talked about Donald Trump’s presidential campaign.

headline.main: David Letterman Goes Top 10 on Donald Trump
headline.print_headline: David Letterman Goes Top 10 on Donald Trump
